body.section:
If you want to install Salomon, download this file.
16.10.2004 install.jar

section.name: Documentation
section.p:
As the name indicates this file contains comprehensive documentation for our project.
16.10.2004 salomon.pdf

section.name: Roadmap
section.p: If you want to know something about our plans for the future, this will be the right document: roadmap.pdf
